name: The Bouldering Project
description:
The objective of this game is to push boulders into holes. You win when every hole is filled. There are over 50 levels!

Controls

Click or tap on a square to move to it. If it is reachable, your tractor will automatically move to it. Click on a boulder you are next to to move it. If you get stuck, click reset to start over.

Alpha Version

This is an alpha version of the game. Future versions of the game will have more levels, updated artwork, additional game mechanics and more.
